name: Parkour (itch) (HelloWorld1)
description:
Enjoy the thrills of running and jumping off walls in this minimalistic parkour game. Run through the many color-coded levels and enjoy wall jumping and wall running your way to the end. 

Try your awesome gaming skills at this bite-sized piece of fun.

--Controls--

WASD to move

Left shift to run

Space to jump

R to restart from your checkpoint (the purple boxes)

Push yourself against a wall to run on it or jump off it

Note: Linux users should try the "other" option if the Linux one doesn't work

Note: You may want to try both the 64 bit and 32 bit downloads if one doesn't work
